trans-unit.source: Represents an Access Control List (ACL).
The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl> class allows full manipulation of Access Control Entries (ACEs).
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl> classe consente la modifica completa di voci di controllo di accesso (ACE).

trans-unit.source: It does not enforce ordering rules for ACEs and does not provide validation logic.
trans-unit.target: Applica le regole di ordinamento per le voci ACE e non fornisce la logica di convalida.

trans-unit.source: Any ACE can be inserted, modified, or removed at any location in the ACL.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi voce ACE pu√≤ essere inserito, modificato o rimosso in qualsiasi posizione nell'elenco ACL.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> class.
The revision level of the new Access Control List (ACL).
The number of Access Control Entries (ACEs) this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object can contain.
This number is to be used only as a hint.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> class with the specified revision level.
An array of byte values that represent an Access Control List (ACL).
The offset in the <c>binaryForm</c> parameter at which to begin unmarshaling data.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> class from the specified binary form.
Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object.
This length should be used before marshaling the ACL into a binary array with the <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" /> method.
The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Lunghezza, in byte, della rappresentazione binaria dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of access control entries (ACEs) in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object.
The number of ACEs in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Numero di voci ACE presenti nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The byte array into which the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> is marshaled.
The offset at which to start marshaling.
Marshals the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
<paramref name="offset" /> is negative or too high to allow the entire <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> to be copied into <paramref name="array" />.
The position at which to add the new ACE.
Specify the value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl.Count" /> property to insert an ACE at the end of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> object.
The ACE to insert.
Inserts the specified Access Control Entry (ACE) at the specified index.
The inserted ACE is not cloned before insertion, so any modifications to the ACE after it has been inserted are reflected in the Access Control List (ACL).
trans-unit.target: La voce ACE inserita non viene duplicata prima dell'inserimento, pertanto le modifiche alla voce dopo che √® stato inserito vengono riflesse nell'elenco di controllo di accesso (ACL).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is negative or too high to allow the entire <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> to be copied into <paramref name="array" />.
The zero-based index of the ACE to get or set.
Gets or sets the Access Control Entry (ACE) at the specified index.
The ACE at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the ACE to remove.
Removes the Access Control Entry (ACE) at the specified location.
The value of the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is higher than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl.Count" /> property minus one or is negative.
Gets the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" />.
A byte value that specifies the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di byte che specifica il livello di revisione della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" />.
